document.full_text: roger federer failed to make the quarter-finals of a tournament for the first time in a year after he was knocked out of the rome masters by frenchman richard gasquet on thursday.
document.title: roger federer crashes out to gasquet in rome
lines_and_colors: roger federer failed to make the quarter-finals of a tournament for the first time in a year after he was knocked out of the rome masters by frenchman richard gasquet on thursday.
